import React, { useContext } from 'react' import mycontext from '../Context/Createcontext' import daily from './Daily png.png' function Showuserdata(props) { const {DeleteNote}=useContext(mycontext) const {note,UpdateNote}=props return ( <>
{note.date} Price : {note.price} {note.work} {note.dailywork}
) } export default Showuserdata
